date.Des: 重击 通用技能 对目标立即造成250%伤害\n召唤 通用技能 血量低于30%时,召唤2只狼协助攻击
date.Des_EN: Smash: General Skill, cause 250% damage to the target immediately \n Summon: General Skill, when HP is less than 30%, summon 2 wolves to assist the attack

date.Des:
魔物炸裂 水系技能 在指定区域召唤出1个魔物,3秒后魔物会炸裂减速50%,持续6秒,200%伤害
生命恢复 通用技能 每20秒恢复最大血量的10%
操纵炸弹 水系技能 对目标区域造成300%伤害,并使其眩晕3秒
巨手挥打 暗系技能 向前方挥打,最前方区域造成300%伤害,并将目标击飞,一段距离
date.Des_EN:
Monster Explode: Water Skill, summon a monster in the designated area. After 3s, the monster will explode and slow down by 50% for 6s, and cause 200% damage 
 Life Recovery: General Skill, restore 10% of the maximum HP every 20s 
 Manipulate bomb: Water Skill, cause 300% damage to the target area and stun it for 3s. 
 Giant Hand: Dark Skill, cause 300% damage in the frontmost area and blow the target up for a distance

date.Des:
狼吼 光系技能 在指定区域释放范围技能,造成300%伤害,并使其眩晕3秒
攻击上升 通用技能 间隔20秒触发,攻击上升20%,持续到战斗结束
重击 光系技能 每次攻击有20%概率对目标造成250%伤害
召唤 通用技能 召唤手下协助自己进行攻击
date.Des_EN: Wolf Roar: Light Skill, release range skill in the designated area, cause 300% damage and stun for 3s \n Attack Rise: General Skill, trigger one time per 20s,and attack rises by 20% until the end of the battle \n Smash: Light Skill, each attack has a 20% probability of causing 250% damage to the target /n Summon: General Skill, summon wolves to assist the attack

date.Des:
狂暴1阶 通用技能 血量低于60%时变大1.5倍,攻击提升20%
狂暴2阶 通用技能 血量低于30%时变大2倍,攻击提升40%
软泥协助 通用技能 战斗开始后,每间隔20秒召唤1个软泥怪进行协助攻击
date.Des_EN: Rage Tier 1: General Skill, volume becomes 1.5 times larger when HP is lower than 60%, attack increases by 20% \n Rage Tier 2: General Skill, volume becomes 2 times larger when HP is lower than 30%, attack increases by 40% \n Ooze Assist: General Skill, After the battle starts, summon a ooze to assist the attack every 20s

date.Des:
守护者防御 通用技能 每30秒从4个方向召唤4只守护者
守护着大军 通用技能 血量低于30%时,从4个方向召唤8只守护着
死亡怒吼 暗系技能 以自己为中心对自己一定范围内的目标造成300%的伤害,并将目标击飞
燃烧火墙 火系技能 在指定区域释放火墙,每0.2秒对目标造成60点伤害,火墙持续至战斗结束
date.Des_EN:
Guardian Defense: General Skill, summon 4 guardians from 4 directions every 30s 
 Guardian Army: General Skill, when HP is less than 30%, summon 8 guards from 4 directions 
 Death Roar: Dark Skill, cause 300% damage to targets around itself within a certain range, and blow the target up 
 Fire Wall: Fire Skill, release a fire wall in the specified area, and cause 60 damage to the target every 0.2s

date.Des:
绿水沼泽 水系技能 随机在地上放置黑水,踩中绿水降低速度并持续造成伤害,绿水一直存在,绿水每0.2秒造成80点伤害
魔物炸弹 光系技能 对某个区域放置一个魔物,3秒后炸药爆炸,对附近目标造成500%伤害,并击飞
坚毅防御 电系技能 免疫一切伤害,持续10秒,每秒随机对3个区域释放毁灭雷击技能造成300%伤害并造成3秒眩晕,释放次技能时不能移动
毁灭雷击 电系技能 连续跟随玩家释放技能,3秒后造成300%伤害,并造成3秒眩晕
光明重击 暗系技能 攻击时有一定概率触发,对目标立即造成250%伤害
date.Des_EN:
Green Swamp: Water Skill, randomly place green swamp on the ground at regular intervals until the battle end up, it will reduce the speed and cause 80 damage per 0.2s 
 Monster Bomb: Light Skill, place a explosive, it will explode after 3s, cause 500% damage to nearby targets and blow them up 
 Persevering Defence: Electrical Skill, immune to all damage for 10s, and randomly release 300 lightning damage to the 3 areas per 1s and cause stun for 3s 
 Lightning Strike: Electrical Skill, releases the skill follow to the player, cause 300% damage after 3s and stun for 3s 
 Dark Strike, Dark Skill, trigger 250% damage to the target immediately

date.Des:
巫术召唤 通用技能 间隔30秒从5个点召唤5个协助攻击的法师,法师攻击较高,请优先击杀
天火降临 火系技能 每次攻击有15%概率在指定区域释放天火,造成300%伤害,并增加灼烧效果,每秒损失最大血量的10%,持续10秒
魔法盾 通用技能 给自己身上添加一个2000点伤害护盾,可以吸收玩家对其造成的伤害,间隔30秒触发一次
愤怒天火 火系技能 血量低于50%时触发,随机在多个区域释放天火降临技能
date.Des_EN:
Witchcraft Summoning: General Skill, summon 5 mage assisting attacks from 5 directions per 30s. Mage attacks are higher, please give priority to killing 
 Fire Burst: Fire Skill, each attack has a 15% probability of releasing fire in a designated area, causing 300% damage, and increase the burning effect, losing 10% of the maximum HP per 1s for 10s 
 Magic Shield: General Skill, add a 2000 damage shield to itself, which can absorb the damage caused by the player, trigger per 30s 
 Angry Skyfire: Fire skill, trigger when HP is below 50%, and randomly release Fire Burst in multiple areas

date.Des:
坚硬 通用技能 血量低于30%的时候,受到伤害降低35%,触发后此状态会维持到战斗结束
落石 光系技能 对指定区域连续释放落石,落石在原地有火焰燃烧,造成巨大伤害
坚硬 通用技能 每隔60秒恢复自身最大血量值的10%
蛮力 通用技能 每隔60秒,提升自身100点攻击,可累加,持续至战斗结束
date.Des_EN: Hard: General Skill, when HP is less than 30%, damage received is reduced by 35% and restore 10% of its maximum HP per 60s until the end of the battle \n Falling Rock: Light Skill, continuously release falling rocks to the designated area. and the falling rocks are burned by flames in place, causing huge damage per 1s \n Brute Force: General Skill, increase 100 attacks per 60s, and it can be accumulated until the end of the battle

date.Des:
海底护卫 通用技能 血量低于80%时,召唤1个巨斧战士进行攻击,巨斧移动慢,攻击高
海底护卫 通用技能 血量低于40%时,再次召唤1个巨斧战士
水浪绽放 水系技能 从多个方向召唤水浪在进行移动,对碰到的目标造成500%伤害并眩晕3秒
水涌攻击 水系技能 在指定区域施放水涌,3秒后释放,对目标区域造成300%伤害,减速50%,持续6秒
毒水侵蚀 水系技能 在指定区域施放毒水,毒水0.2秒造成150点伤害,毒水一直存在
date.Des_EN:
Undersea Guard: General Skill, when HP is less than 80% and less than 40%, summon a axeman to attack, the axeman moves slowly but the attack is high 
 Wave Blooming: Water Skill, summon the water wave to move from multiple directions, causing 500% damage to the target and stun for 3 seconds 
 Surge Attack: Water Skill, cast a swell in a designated area and release it after 3s, causing 300% damage to the target area and slowing it by 50% for 6s 
 Poisonous Erosion: Water Skill, cast Poisonous Water in the designated area and cause 150 damage per 0.2s until the end of the battle

date.Des:
熔岩爆裂 电系技能 对目标范围内造成300%伤害
猛烈冲击 光系技能 对前方目标区域造成500%伤害,并造成减速效果
熔岩冲撞 光系技能 对前方区域进行冲锋,并造成500%伤害,并造成眩晕效果
重击 光系技能 攻击时有一定概率触发重击,造成250%伤害
date.Des_EN:
Lava Burst: Electrical Skill, cause 300% damage within the target range 
 Fierce Impact: Light Skill, cause 500% damage to the target area in the front, and slow the speed for 3s 
 Lava Crash: Light Skill, crash to the front area, and causes 500% damage, and cause stun effect 
 Heavy Strike: Light Skill, have a large probability of triggering a heavy strike, causing 250% damage

date.Des:
喷火 火系技能 对前方区域持续喷火3秒,每秒造成150%伤害,减速50%,Buff持续6秒
爆发 通用技能 血量低于30%时,攻击提升30%
狂暴 通用技能 战斗开始后60秒触发,攻击提升100%
分裂 暗系技能 30秒释放一次,召唤1只饥饿龙,如果指定10秒内,召唤的小饥饿龙没有被击杀则发生自爆,对附近造成500%伤害
date.Des_EN:
Spitfire: Fire Skill, continue to spit fire in front of the area for 3s, causing 150% damage per 1s, slowing down by 50% and lasting 6s 
 Eruption: General Skill, when its HP is less than 30%, its attack increases by 30% 
 Rage: General Skill, triggered 60s after the start of the battle, and its attack is increased by 100% 
 Split: Dark Skill, released once per 30s, and summon a little hungry dragon. If the summoned little hungry dragon is not killed within 10s, it will explode and cause 500% damage

date.Des:
巨斧重击 光系技能 每15秒原地朝前方挥砍一次,造成400%伤害
精英协助 通用技能 每隔一段时间将召唤2名巨斧精英协助自己战斗
巨斧眩晕 光系技能 每次普通攻击10%概率,眩晕目标3秒
生命图腾 通用技能 每30秒触发一次,在指定区域召唤图腾,如果10秒内没击杀则恢复BOSS最大血量值的30%
date.Des_EN:
Axe Slam: Light skill, slashe forward in front of the place per 15s and cause 400% damage 
 Elite Assist: General Skill, summon 2 Axe Elites to assist in the battle at intervals 
 Axe Stun: Light Skill, each normal attack has a 10% probability to stun the target for 3s 
 Life Totem: General Skill, triggered per 30s, summon a totem in a designated area, and restore 30% of the maximum HP if it isn't be killed within 10s

date.Des:
电击崩裂 电系技能 以自身为中心释放一个电光圈,3秒后范围的目标受到500%的伤害
天火降临 火系技能 对目标区域释放一个陷阱，3秒后触发,目标踩到后就会减速10秒,每秒损失最大血量上限的10%的血量值
自爆小队 暗系技能 机器人会自动跑到玩家身边然后自爆造成500%的伤害
猛烈一击 光系技能 每20秒释放一次,重拳自身前方的区域,造成300%的伤害,并将目标向后击退一段距离
date.Des_EN:
Electric Shock: Electrical Skill, release an electro-aperture centered on itself. After 3s, the target in the range will receive 500% damage 
 Fire Coming: Fire Skill, release a trap on the target area and trigger after 3s, which can slow down for 10s and cause 10% of the maximum HP of the player per 1s 
 Self-detonation Team: Dark Skill, release a robot, it will automatically run to the player and then detonate and cause 500% damage 
 Fierce Punch: Light Skill, punch the area in front of itself per 20s, causing 300% damage and knocking the target back a distance

date.Des:
召唤沙虫 通用技能 20秒召唤一只,沙虫移动速度慢,但是攻击很高,建议风筝击杀
减速光坏 通用技能 开战时,每隔10秒降低玩家5%的移动速度,可累加,持续至战斗结束
黑暗能量 暗系技能 对目标脚底下释放黑暗能量,每0.2秒造成30%伤害,持续至战斗结束
鬼火 火系技能 30秒召唤一团火追着你跑,鬼火会一直存在,当火焰碰触到你后给你释放一个灼烧BUFF,每秒损失最大血量上限的20%,持续6秒
献祭 通用技能 对周围目标每秒损失5%最大血量值,此技能一直持续至战斗结束
date.Des_EN:
Sandworm Summon: General Skill, summon a sandworm per 20s, it move slowly but have high attack 
 Slow Halo General Skill, reduce the player's speed by 5% per 10s after the battle starts, it can be accumulated until the end of the battle 
 Dark Energy: Dark Skill, release dark energy at the foot of the target, causing 30 damage per 0.2s until the end of the battle 
 Ghost Fire, Fire Skill, summon a fire to chase the player and run in 30s and release a burning BUFF, which will lose 20% of the maximum HP per 1s and continue for 6s 
 Sacrifice: General Skill, cause 5% of the maximum HP damage per 1s to surrounding targets until the end of the battle

date.Des:
疯狂攻击 光系技能 每次攻击有15%概率对目标造成一次重击伤害,额外造成250%伤害
狂暴 通用技能 每隔10秒,攻击提升10%,持续至战斗结束
斗士崩裂 光系技能 对前方区域释放崩裂,前方区域造成500%伤害
date.Des_EN: Crazy Attack: Light Skill, each attack has a 15% probability of hitting the target with a critical hit damage, causing an additional 250% damage \n Rage: General Skill, the attack will increase by 10% per 10s until the end of the battle \n Fighter Crack: Light Skill, release a burst in the front area and cause 500% damage

date.Des:
爆炸震裂 电系技能 对指定区域进行攻击,造成300%伤害+3秒眩晕效果
召唤火石 火系技能 连续发出火石,每秒损失200%伤害,并触发灼烧,每秒损失自身最大血量的10%,火石会一直存在至战斗结束
召唤火雨 火系技能 对指定区域发出火雨,预判3秒+高伤害200%,持续5秒
召唤冰雨 水系技能 对指定区域发出冰雨,减速+100%伤害,持续6秒
date.Des_EN:
Explosive Shock: Electrical Skill, attack the designated area, cause 300% damage and stun 3s 
 Firestone Coming: Fire Skill, continuously release firestones, cause 200% damage per 1s, then trigger burning ,which can cause 10% of the player's maximum HP per 1s 
 Fire Star: Fire Skill, summon fire stars on the designated area, causing 200% damage for 5s 
 Ice Snow: Water Skill, summon ice snow on the designated area, slow down the player and cause 100% damage for 6s

date.Des:
生命恢复 通用技能 每隔20秒,恢复自身最大血量的10%
爆炸蘑菇 水系技能 每次攻击10%在目标脚底生成一个毒蘑菇,附带眩晕3秒
蘑菇毒素 水系技能 每次攻击有10%概率讲毒素注入到玩家体内,移动速度降低50%,持续3秒
蘑菇守护 通用技能 每隔一定时间会召唤一只蘑菇护卫对进行攻击
date.Des_EN:
Life Recovery: General Skill, restore 10% of its own maximum HP per 20s 
 Explosive Mushroom: Water Skill, each attack has 10% probability to generate a poisonous mushroom at the bottom of the target's foot and stun for 3s 
 Mushroom Poison: Water Skill, each attack has 10% probability of injecting poison into the player's body, reducing speed by 50% for 3s 
 Mushroom Guard: General Skill, summon a mushroom guard to attack at regular intervals

date.Des:
恶龙守护 通用技能 每隔20秒召唤小龙,小龙出现后就指定目标区域放火雨,每次火雨持续20秒
灵魂火墙 火系技能 召唤灵魂火墙在场景内进行移动,对碰到的目标造成,350%伤害
高阶灵魂火墙 火系技能 血量低于30%是触发,灵魂火墙会更加频繁的出现
恶灵天雷 电系技能 在区域连续召唤天雷,300%伤害,减速50%,持续3秒
痛苦重击 暗系技能 每次攻击10%概率造成200%伤害
痛苦防线 通用技能 战斗时间超过90秒后,自身放大,伤害提升100%
date.Des_EN:
Dragon Guardian: General Skill, summon a little dragon per 20s, it will designate a fire rain in the target area amd last 20s 
 Fire Wall: Fire Skill, summon 2 fire walls to move in the scene and cause 350% damage, they will appear more frequently when BOSS's HP is less than 30% 
 Evil Thunder: Lightning Skill, continuously summon thunder in the area, cause 300% damage and slow down by 50% for 3s 
 Painful Smash: Dark Skill, each attack has 10% probability to cause 200% damage 
 Painful Defense: General Skill, it will magnifiy itself and the attack will increase by 100% when the battle reachs 90s

date.Des:
大力挥击 光系技能 对前方区域造成一次伤害300%伤害加5秒眩晕
眩晕击 通用技能 每次攻击有10%概率对目标造成3秒眩晕
冲撞 光系技能 对指定直线的目标进行冲撞,造成300%伤害,并眩晕5秒
坚硬 通用技能 战斗30秒后触发,受到伤害降低20%,持续至战斗结束
date.Des_EN:
Swing: Light Skill, cause 300% damage on the front area and stun for 5s 
 Dizziness Strike: General Skill, each attack has a 10% probability of stunting the target for 3s 
 Crash: Light Skill, crash to the target in a straight line, cause 300% damage and stun for 5s 
 Hard: General Skill, reduce injury by 20% when the battle reachs 30s

date.Des:
铁人怒吼 水系技能 每次攻击20%概率触发一次,对自身周围一定范围内造成伤害500%伤害
呼喊护卫 通用技能 20秒召唤小怪协助自己攻击,小怪附带概率眩晕技能
生命恢复 通用技能 30秒1次恢复自身最大血量的10%,并且增加自身
狂暴 通用技能 血量低于30%时,受到伤害减免30%,伤害提升30%
date.Des_EN:
Iron Roar: Water Skill, each attack has 20% probability to cause 500% damage in a certain range around itself 
 Summon Guard: General Skill, summon guards to assist itself per 20s 
 Life Recovery, General Skill, restore 10% of its maximum HP per 30s and increase attack 
 Rage: General Skill, reduce injury by 30% and increase damage by 30% when its HP is less than 30%

date.Des:
操纵天雷 电系技能 15秒释放一次在指定区域召唤天雷攻击目标,造成500%伤害
操纵天雷 电系技能 每次攻击有20%概率释放一次在指定区域召唤天雷攻击目标,造成500%伤害
光圈炸弹 电系技能 每隔20秒会出现一个光圈炸弹,3秒后对目标区域造成伤害和眩晕效果
操纵图腾 通用技能 30秒施放,10秒内把图腾打死就是眩晕加伤害,图腾的血量10000
操纵冲击 暗系技能 每10，20，30秒从3个方向冲击波,每道冲击波造成300%伤害
date.Des_EN:
Sky Thunder: Electrical Skill, summon sky thunder to attack targets in the designated area per 15s, causing 500% damage, each attack also has 20% probability of summoning sky thunder 
 Aperture Bomb: Electrical Skill, release an aperture bomb per 20s, it will cause damage and stun effect to the target area 
 Totem Control: General Skill, cast a totem per 30s, if it isn't be destroyed within 10s, the player will be stuned and get damage(the totem's HP is 10,000) 
 Shock Control: Dark Skill, release shock waves from 3 directions per 10s, each shock wave causes 300% damage

date.Des:
巨雷降临 电系技能 20秒随机生成N个天雷,300%伤害
自爆 暗系技能 30秒触发一次指定区域自爆炸弹,受到伤害500%伤害
献祭 通用技能 战斗开始时,每秒对附近玩家造成最大血量上限2%的伤害
坚毅 通用技能 血量低于30%时,受到伤害降低30%
烈焰灼烧 火系技能 20秒在指定区域生成火墙,火墙每秒损失目标玩家最大血量10%
烈焰灼烧 火系技能 每次攻击有20%概率在指定区域生成火墙,火墙每秒损失目标玩家最大血量10%
date.Des_EN:
Giant Thunder: Electrical Skill, randomly generate many gaint thunders per 20s, causing 300% damage 
 Self-explosion: Dark Skill, trigger a designated area self-explosive bomb per 30s, causing 500% damage 
 Sacrifice: General Skill, cause 2% damage of the maximum HP of nearby target per 1s from the beginning of the battle 
 Perseverance: General Skill, reduce injury by 30% when HP is less than 30% 
 Flame Burning: Fire Skill, release a fire wall in the designated area per 20s, cause 10% of the player's maximum HP per 1s, and each attack also has 20% probability of generating a fire wall in the designated area

date.MonsterName: 远古巨龙领主-库尔塔兹
date.Des:
幽灵冲击 暗系技能 在场景中生成一个幽灵,在场景内随机游荡,对碰撞的目标造成400%伤害
高阶幽灵冲击 暗系技能 当血量低于50%时,幽灵冲击的触发频率会大幅度提高
召唤镜像 通用技能 30秒,镜像移动速度慢,攻击高,每次攻击附带1秒眩晕,3秒攻击1次
生命恢复 通用技能 每10秒回复自身5%的最大血量
旋转光柱 光系技能 20秒,在指定区域召唤一个旋转的光柱,持续存在,每0.2秒损失350点血量值
最终防线 通用技能 战斗超过120秒,攻击提升100%
远古光环 通用技能 战斗开始时,每秒对附近玩家造成最大血量上限5%的伤害
date.Des_EN:
Ghost Impact: Dark Skill, generate a ghost, wandering randomly in the scene, causing 400% damage to the colliding target 
 Higher Ghost Impact: Dark Skill, trigger frequency of the ghost impact when HP is less than 50% 
 Summon Mirror: General Skill, summon a mirror whose speed is slow but has high attack per 30s, each attack will stun for 1s 
 Life Recovery: General Skill, restore its own 5% maximum HP per 10s 
 Rotating Beam: Light Skill, summon a rotating beam in the designated area per 20s, and cause 350 damage per 0.2s 
 Final Defense: General Skill, the attack increases by 100% when the battle reachs 120s 
 Ancient Halo: General Skill, cause 5% of the player's maximum HP damage per 1s until the end of the battle

date.MonsterName: 传承圣殿-圣殿烈焰女王
